data.text: We urge passengers travelling to and from Cebu to avoid going to the airport unless they have confirmed flights.

3. Refund  
The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

2. Travel Fund  
Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.)

1. Free Rebooking  
Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR :

5J 140/141   Cebu – Boracay – Cebu 

DG 6573/6574   Cebu – Tacloban – Cebu 

5J 553/554  Manila-Cebu-Manila

Here are the additional cancelled flights: 

Flight Number  Route 
DG 6690/6691   Cebu – Camiguin-Cebu
DG 6066/6067  Cebu – Coron – Cebu 
DG 6923/6924   Cebu – Butuan – Cebu

Cebu Pacific Advisory #3  

Affected flights due to runway closure in Cebu  

October 24, 2022, 10:00AM   

Cebu Pacific has cancelled flights to and from Cebu as a result of a runway closure at the Mactan airport due to a disabled aircraft of an international airline. https://t.co/NIkEZckTNA

DG 6575/5676 Cebu – Tacloban – Cebu
5J 568/567 Cebu – Manila – Manila
DG 6603/6604 Cebu – Dipolog – Cebu
5J 578/577 Cebu – Manila – Cebu
5J 249/250 Cebu - General Santos - Cebu

DG 6575/5676 Cebu – Tacloban – Cebu
5J 568/567 Cebu – Manila – Manila
DG 6603/6604 Cebu – Dipolog – Cebu
5J 578/577 Cebu – Manila – Cebu
5J 249/250 Cebu - Gensan - Cebu

For those who wish to voluntarily postpone their flights, they may avail of Cebu Pacific's flexible options which include free rebooking and travel fund.
Cebu Pacific is currently engaging with the authorities and will provide updates as necessary.

data.text:
(example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.)
3. Refund
The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.
We urge passengers travelling to and from Cebu to only proceed to the airport if they have confirmed flights.

The fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
2. Travel Fund
Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons

Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options:
1. Free Rebooking
Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date.

DG 6719/6718 Cebu – Cagayan de Oro – Cebu
5J 132/133 Cebu – Boracay (Caticlan) – Cebu

urls.description: We heard you, everyJuan! The CEB Super Pass is back, until October 13, 2022 only! Buy as many one-way vouchers as you can and fly to any Philippines destination, anytime! Terms and conditions apply. We've reached the maximum number of passes sold. This was a great run! Super thank you! CEB Super Pass selling period has ended. Check out our Seat Sale page for more offers! Redeem your voucher and book a flight to any Philippine destination! Redemption Period: October 10, 2022 to November 23, 2023 Travel

data.text: Wish mo bang maaga ang PASSko? Nandito na ang SUPER inaabangan mo! The #CEBSuperPass is back at pwedeng-pwedeng pangregalo! Buy all you can and fly when you can to ANY domestic destination! Get yours now at https://t.co/K0DWlMwAbs until Oct 13, 2022! T&Cs apply. https://t.co/yNFukNYVom

#CEBAdvisory - additional cancellations as of 3am

5J991/992 Manila – General Santos – Manila* 
5J891/892 Manila – Boracay (Caticlan) – Manila * 
5J657/658 Manila – Tacloban – Manila*  

Affected passengers on the above flights have been rebooked to the next available flights.

For other questions or concerns,  passengers may send a message via Charlie the Chatbot on the Cebu Pacific website. 
 
We will provide updates as necessary.

They may also opt to select their preferred option (rebook, travel fund, refund) online through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website (https://t.co/GAB2WonRbR) until 30 days from date of departure.

•5J565/566 Manila – Cebu – Manila  

Affected passengers on the above flights have been rebooked to the next available flights.

•5J381/382 Manila – Cagayan de Oro – Manila  
•5J635/636 Manila – Puerto Princesa – Manila  
•5J483/484 Manila – Bacolod – Manila  
•5J919/920 Manila – Boracay (Caticlan) – Manila   
•5J451/452 Manila – Iloilo – Manila  
•5J785/786 Manila – Butuan – Manila

As we recover from the operational impact brought about by Typhoon Karding (Noru), Cebu Pacific has cancelled the following flights for September 26, 2022: 
 
•5J325/326 Manila – Legazpi – Manila 
•5J861/862 Manila – Zamboanga – Manila  
•5J961/962 Manila – Davao – Manila

Flexible Options due to Typhoon Karding (Noru) 
As of September 26, 2022, 12:15am https://t.co/FUKIT0Uwdf

data.text: Those who wish to voluntarily postpone their scheduled flights may avail of CEB’s flexible options online - Rebook or Convert to Travel Fund - via https://t.co/GAB2WonRbR up to two (2) hours before their scheduled time of departure. https://t.co/fRXtmscZAn
CEB will also be extending its flexible options for passengers with flights touching Manila until 12 noon tomorrow, September 26, 2022.

Affected passengers have been informed and provided options (rebook, travel fund, refund) earlier.  
 
5J196/197 Manila – Cauayan – Manila 
5J504/505 Manila – Tuguegarao – Manila  
DG6111/6112 Manila – Naga – Manila  
DG6117/6118 Manila – Naga – Manila 
DG6504 Cebu – Manila

Cebu Pacific Advisory #2 
Flexible Options due to Super Typhoon Karding (Noru) 
As of September 25, 2022, 7:30pm 

In light of the impending typhoon, Karding (Noru), Cebu Pacific and Cebgo has already cancelled the following flights today, September 25, 2022.

1. Rebook 

Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. Fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from original flight date.

5J196/197 Manila – Cauayan – Manila 
5J504/505 Manila – Tuguegarao – Manila  
DG6111/6112 Manila – Naga – Manila  
DG6117/6118 Manila – Naga – Manila 
DG6504 Cebu – Manila

For other questions or concerns, passengers may send a message via Charlie the Chatbot on the Cebu Pacific website.

We will provide updates as necessary.
To view the complete list of flights that are scheduled to operate today, please click here: https://t.co/SFb3Lz6g39.

data.text: iSEP na san pupunta! May international early BERd #CEBSeatSale rin for as low as P799 (one-way base fare)! Book now until Sep 15, 2022 then travel from Oct 1 2022 to Feb 28, 2023! Book now at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24! https://t.co/PCd0LGGgYU

You’re just one step away from becoming a MyCebuPacific member! Don’t forget to check your mail and also your spam/junk folder for a VERIFICATION EMAIL. 

Sign up for a MyCebuPacific account NOW at https://t.co/KrJafvyLuz https://t.co/wd70NxpD8g

Bai, travel wais-ly with CEB in this special #CEBSeatSale! Enjoy safe, easy, and convenient flights for as low as P299 one-way base fare on Visayas and Mindanao routes for travel until February 28, 2023! 
 
Book now until Sep 15 at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24! Fly Ta Bai!✈️ https://t.co/dcMhWqGf4n

Tana, fly ta bai! Travel wais-ly!

Low fares and seat sales? Convenient direct flights from VisMin? Safe and easy travel? We gotchu, Bai! All these reasons why you should fly with Cebu Pacific now ✈️

Book na ta! https://t.co/uWpPBA6C6D https://t.co/agFW4iRX8P

data.text: You get 7 kg. for hand carry baggage (your backpack, handbag, or laptop bag) You can add up to two (2) pieces of checked baggage – both either 20 kg. or 32 kg. Get prepaid baggage to save up to 64% vs. adding in the airport! Learn more at https://t.co/HXnpk2BrTy https://t.co/Yym4NFCy0k

Calling all early BERds 📣 The first #CEBSeatSale of September is here! Fly as soon as you book to select domestic destinations for as low as P88 (one-way base fare) and travel until Feb 28, 2023! Book now until Sep 15, 2022 at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24! ✈️ https://t.co/vWVReKANiv

Passengers may now manage their bookings on the website and mobile app and customers may redeem their CEB Super Pass (CSP) online.  

We thank our passengers for their patience and understanding.

#CEBAdvisory  
Issues on Manage Booking  
As of August 30, 2022; 11:20PM 

Cebu Pacific announces that all system issues have been resolved and services are back to normal. https://t.co/aoNsIuJfQ1

data.text:
For customers who are having problems redeeming their CEB Super Pass (CSP), we will provide an update once the issue has been resolved and CSP bookings are back online.  

We apologize for the inconvenience this has caused.
CEB advises passengers who are experiencing check-in problems to please proceed to the airport at an earlier time so we can manage the manual check-in.

#CEBAdvisory - Issues on Manage Booking as of August 30, 2022; 7:30pm 

Cebu Pacific (CEB) is currently experiencing issues affecting the Manage Booking services on both its website and mobile app. We are currently working to resolve the matter. https://t.co/bDy53cH7E5

data.text:
For the win ang travels with CEB Travelsure with COVID Protect!
 
For as low as P457 lang, covered ka ng up to P1M (dom) or P2.5M (int'l) Medical Expense Benefit sa COVID-19 related hospitalization & treatments. Sign up for a MyCebuPacific account NOW at https://t.co/KrJafvha5Z. https://t.co/2zxkeil98g

Don’t ghost the last #CEBSeatSale this August kasi you can fly domestic as soon as October 1 until January 31, 2023 for as low as P188 (one-way base fare)! Book now at https://t.co/taKDgpVdRC! https://t.co/kXV00U8BYg

data.text: We urge guests travelling from August 23, 7pm to August 24, 3am to check in online, in advance. Passengers must save their boarding pass on their mobile phone, for faster check-in at the airport.

Those with urgent travels or planned rebooking changes should book or manage their flights ahead of time.

Meanwhile, for those with flights departing during the scheduled system downtime, our teams are ready to conduct manual check-in at the airport.
Our booking system will undergo a scheduled system downtime on August 23, 7pm to August 24, 3am (PHT). During this time, guests will not be able to book, manage flights or check in online.

data.text:
Cebu Pacific garnered a perfect score of 7 stars for COVID safety from https://t.co/KcJwrxUFK5, in accordance with global aviation standards.

Feel safe and fly with peace of mind - book your flights at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24. https://t.co/V2w5KqTQ69

It’s Payday Flyday! As a masipag ferson, dasurv mo to spend your sweldo!😉 Fly now until January 31, 2023 to your favorite domestic destinations for as low as P88 one-way base fare. Book your seats now at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24. Until August 26 lang! ✈️ https://t.co/CMgHnCWnqQ

Here’s an easy-to-use checklist for all the important items you need to Fly Easy! Make sure you have them all for a smooth travel. Don’t forget to check out your LGU requirements at https://t.co/GOvASHARMa. 

Book your next #CEBTravels now at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24. https://t.co/CJMkdeJSju

Book your flights and purchase add-ons with Cebu Pacific's many payment options--now including e-wallets!  

Fly easy and pay using GCash, GrabPay, or Maya. You can even pay with Credit/Debit cards, through Payment Centers, and your Travel Fund! Book NOW! https://t.co/taKDgpUG24 https://t.co/9goqyV9XWe
